name: inventree
description: InvenTree is an open source inventory management system for manufacturing and electronics projects. It tracks parts, stock, suppliers, builds and BOMs, with granular locations and a modern web UI suited for labs, makerspaces and small companies.
features: Parts Management: Track components, assemblies, and finished products with detailed specifications.
Stock Control: Monitor inventory levels across multiple locations with low-stock alerts.
BOM Management: Create and manage bill of materials for assemblies and products.
Supplier Integration: Track suppliers, purchase orders, and pricing information.
Build Orders: Manage production builds with material allocation and tracking.
Location Tracking: Organize inventory across warehouses, shelves, and bins.
Barcode Support: Generate and scan barcodes for efficient inventory operations.
API Access: Integrate with other systems using comprehensive REST API.
